column4: hello all - i am unable to eject my CDROM with the button or by selecting eject from the menu. Does not work as root either! Anyone experience something similar?
if that doesn't work it is a hardware problem
does not eject when i type sudo eject. Thing is stuck in there for good. I was figuring something to do with the bios becuase i can't even get it open during POST. bleh.
